alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 11 at 2:07PM MDT until April 14 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TUESDAY TO NOON MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 11 inches, highest amounts along the Montana and North Dakota borders. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph, strongest winds are expected Wednesday. * WHERE...Harding County and Perkins County. * WHEN...From 3 AM Tuesday to noon MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
